title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Canoe Rentals  Ranger Programs  Calendar  Camping Traditional Craft & Skills Demonstrations Bicycling  Hiking  Horseback Riding Birdwatching Nearby Attractions Stargazing  Hunting & Fishing  ATV (4-wheeler) Rules    Â      Alley Mill is a great place to visit year round. During the summer months you can tour this historic 1894 roller mill, but the grounds are open year round.
